structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Analysis Of Samples Of Alcoholic Beverages
law.text: [ Text of section added by 2012, 139, Sec. 56 effective July 1, 2012. See 2012, 139, Sec. 229.] The department shall analyze, in accordance with sections 36 to 39, inclusive, of chapter 138, all samples of alcoholic beverages, as defined in section 1 of said chapter 138, submitted to it for that purpose by police authorities as provided in said section 36 if satisfied that the analysis is to be used in enforcing the laws.
